name: Night Infested (angelinabells)
description: Night Infested is a horror visual novel with a variety of paths and endings that the player is encouraged to explore and experience. Our story is centered around you, the player, realizing your friend has gone missing during a house party. To your horror, you find their disembodied arm outside. This event transports you to a world where reality is different than your used to and terrifying creatures encounter you. Your goal is to get back home safely and survive the night.
